org.apache.arrow.plasma

Class PlasmaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.plasma.PlasmaClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectStoreLink

    public class PlasmaClient
extends Object
implements ObjectStoreLink
    The PlasmaClient is used to interface with a plasma store and manager.

    The PlasmaClient can ask the PlasmaStore to allocate a new buffer, seal a buffer, and get a buffer. Buffers are referred to by object IDs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.arrow.plasma.ObjectStoreLink

      • put

        public void put(byte[] objectId,
                byte[] value,
                byte[] metadata)
         throws DuplicateObjectException,
                PlasmaOutOfMemoryException
        Description copied from interface: ObjectStoreLink
        Put value in the local plasma store with object ID objectId.
        Specified by:
        put in interface ObjectStoreLink
        Parameters:
        objectId - The object ID of the value to be put.
        value - The value to put in the object store.
        metadata - encodes whatever metadata the user wishes to encode.
        Throws:
        DuplicateObjectException
        PlasmaOutOfMemoryException

      • get

        public List<byte[]> get(byte[][] objectIds,
                        int timeoutMs,
                        boolean isMetadata)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectStoreLink
        Get buffers from the PlasmaStore based on objectIds.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ObjectStoreLink
        Parameters:
        objectIds - List of object IDs used to identify some objects.
        timeoutMs - The number of milliseconds that the get call should block before timing out and returning. Pass -1 if the call should block and 0 if the call should return immediately.
        isMetadata - false if get data, otherwise get metadata.
        Returns:
        List of PlasmaBuffers wrapping objects.

      • hash

        public byte[] hash(byte[] objectId)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectStoreLink
        Compute the hash of an object in the object store.
        Specified by:
        hash in interface ObjectStoreLink
        Parameters:
        objectId - The object ID used to identify the object.
        Returns:
        A digest byte array contains object's SHA256 hash. null means that the object isn't in the object store.

      • get

        public List<ObjectStoreLink.ObjectStoreData> get(byte[][] objectIds,
                                                 int timeoutMs)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectStoreLink
        Get buffer pairs (data & metadata) from the PlasmaStore based on objectIds.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ObjectStoreLink
        Parameters:
        objectIds - List of object IDs used to identify some objects.
        timeoutMs - The number of milliseconds that the get call should block before timing out and returning. Pass -1 if the call should block and 0 if the call should return immediately.
        Returns:
        List of Pairs of PlasmaBuffer wrapping objects and its metadata.

      • evict

        public long evict(long numBytes)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectStoreLink
        Evict some objects to recover given count of bytes.
        Specified by:
        evict in interface ObjectStoreLink
        Parameters:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to attempt to recover.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes that have been evicted.

      • seal

        public void seal(byte[] objectId)
        Seal the buffer in the PlasmaStore for a particular object ID. Once a buffer has been sealed, the buffer is immutable and can only be accessed through get.
        Parameters:
        objectId - used to identify an object.
